title: Complete in-app purchase. Use Sandbox account if available
custom_preconds:
The latest ATV bag installed for the environment tested on
An approved sandbox IAP account from https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BLnI6z7l7XXzNOQ7itdDGDUklAwamP3rhU33kgEgjH4/edit?pli=1#gid=677785120
An email account that has not been associated with HBO Now

*IAP For FireTV might need a real Credit Card and Free Trial - Be sure to CANCEL The account and subscription after verifying the updates
custom_steps:
Select the appropriate APP (Prod, Staging, QA, RETAIL)
Select Start your Free Trial
Sign-in with the IAP account APPLE ID from the Sandbox IAP account list
custom_expected:
HBO Now complete registration email received
Welcome HBO Now email received
IAP complete - User is able to get asset playback

title: Complete subscription renewal in-app
custom_steps:
Log in with an expired account
Execute renewal flow
custom_expected:
Account is renewed
Video playback
User can sign-out / sign-in

title: Login with valid account
custom_steps: Select "Already an HBO NOW Subscriber? Sign in"
custom_expected:
User logs in and is taken to the Home screen
User is able to select and launch playback of any available asset

title: Attempt to login with an expired account
custom_preconds: an expired HBOnow account associated with an iTunes IAP
custom_steps:
Enter the expired user information 
attempt to login
custom_expected:
User is prompted to renew
User can complete renewal flow
Renewal text and emails correctly inform user of subscription and setup

title: Attempt to login with an invalid email address
custom_preconds:
An invalid email account
ab@out.net
qazxswed
custom_expected: Invalid email address should return a user error and let the user input the email address to login

title: Enable Parental Controls
custom_preconds:
a valid HBO now account
enabled parental control ratings on hbonow.com
Change Parental Control ratings to restrict TV-MA
custom_steps:
Log in with valid HBO now account
Navigate to any TV-MA content
Attempt to play restricted content
custom_expected:
User receive a message stating the account does not meet the parental control settings
User is unable to play restricted content

title: Change PIN on web
custom_preconds:
A valid HBOnow account
Parental Controls enabled
custom_steps:
login with a valid account on HBOnow.com
Change the Parental control PIN > Edit Parental control ratings to tighter content restrictions
return to app
initiate playback on restricted and non-restricted content
custom_expected:
Parental controls update to reflect changes from Web

Playback is not impacted, correct rating restrictions

title: Change PIN on web during playback
custom_preconds:
A valid HBOnow account
Parental Controls enabled
Playback of content
custom_steps:
begin asset playback of TV-MA or R rated content
login with a valid account on HBOnow.com
Change the Parental Control PIN > Edit Parental control ratings to disallow TV-MA or R rated content
custom_expected: Parental controls update to reflect changes from Web

title: Scrubbing performance
custom_steps:
Login with a valid HBOnow account
Begin asset playback
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 1x
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 2x
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 3x
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 4x
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 5x

Please note speeds reflected above as 1 ~ 5 x are not actually 1 ~ 5 times faster. Merely noting the number of FFWD/RWD arrows on screen
custom_expected:
Is the experience improved? 

When coming out of scrubbing, playback does not skip, freeze, or otherwise misbehave

title: Pixelation on scrubbing
custom_steps:
Login with a valid HBOnow account
Begin asset playback
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 1 speed
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 2 speed
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 3 speed
custom_expected:
Note the pixelation that occurs when scrubbing

When coming out of scrubbing, pixelation does not persist and quality returns

*if the image distortion is improved from production while scrubbing

title: Audio Sync
custom_steps:
Login with a valid HBOnow account
Begin asset playback
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 1 speed
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 2 speed
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 3 speed
Resume asset playback at normal speeds
custom_expected:
Verify we are not seeing any issues at start up or throughout after scrubbing and during playback 

When coming out of scrubbing, audio playback does not skip, freeze, or otherwise misbehave

title: End to end playback
custom_steps:
Login with a valid HBOnow account
Begin asset playback
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 1 speed
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 2 speed
FFWD and RWD during playback at speed 3 speed
custom_expected:
Verify we don’t see any unexpected behavior in the duration of playback

There are several assets that are available with this new encryption method. Please test using any of these assets:

Ballers Sn 1 Ep 7 Ends
Lewis Black: Black on Broadway
Canelo vs. Kirkland (5/9/15)
